5.1.4.name: wordpress/app-your-wordpress-uppsite
5.1.4.description:
UppSite helps you better reach and engage with your audience on mobile devices, such as iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone. Mobile for WordPress by UppSite turns your WordPress site into powerful mobile apps (native and HTML5), so anyone accessing your site from a mobile device enjoys the best user experience. Install this plugin to enjoy the most comprehensive mobile presence available as UppSite delivers the easiest, fastest and most advanced way to turn your WordPress site into customizable native mobile apps for iPhone, iPad, Android and Windows Phone devices, as well as native-style HTML5 apps (also known as webapps or mobile sites) for mobile web browsers.

It’s free to get started (no credit card required, no forced donations). Welcome to the Mobile Era!

Features

  • True Mobile Presence, means -

    ✓ Better Reach - UppSite supports all major mobile platforms. iOS (iPhone and iP
